title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, April 29, 2022
description: "Jazz has always been like the kind of a man you wouldn't want your daughter to associate with" -- Edward Kennedy aka Duke Ellington, born 4/29/1899.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
